about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the dark, gothic Sengoku period in Wrath of Onryō, a brutal hack and slash adventure driven by vengeance and loss. Play as Yuri, the last surviving member of her bloodline, as she harnesses ancient, forbidden powers to battle the demon Zarok and his corrupted army. With intense combat, eerie environments, and a rich, emotionally charged story, Wrath of Onryō will take you on a relentless journey to avenge your fallen family and reclaim a world teetering on the edge of destruction.

Master Devastating Combat:

Unleash devastating combos with a mix of bare-handed martial arts and deadly melee weapons. Master a fluid combat system that rewards precision and timing, allowing you to chain together high-impact attacks to decimate waves of demonic foes. Sacrifice your own blood to invoke the powers of the Onryo spirit and turn the tide in even the most brutal encounters.

Face Your Twisted Foes:

Face an array of terrifying enemies, each once human but twisted into monstrous forms by Zarok’s dark magic. From agile demonic foot soldiers to towering, grotesque beasts, each foe presents unique challenges that will test your skill and strategy. To make matters worse, many of these enemies were once Yuri’s family and friends, adding an emotional weight to every battle.

Explore Haunting Worlds:

Journey across three desolate and hauntingly beautiful islands, each ravaged by Zarok’s demonic influence. Explore ancient temples, abandoned villages, and eerie forests as you hunt down Zarok's soul orbs hidden deep within these gothic landscapes. Each environment is filled with secrets, danger, and a heavy atmosphere of decay, immersing you in a world on the brink of total destruction.

A Story of Vengeance and Betrayal:

300 years ago, the demon Zarok was summoned by a power-hungry human, only to be defeated and sealed away by a warrior who worshipped the Onryo spirit. But now, Zarok has been unleashed again, corrupting the world and turning humans into his demonic army. Yuri, the last of her bloodline, witnesses her parents’ brutal murder by Zarok’s forces and narrowly escapes death herself. Guided by the spirit of the warrior who once defeated Zarok, Yuri vows to reclaim her family’s honor, destroy the demon's army, and seal Zarok away for good — but not without paying the ultimate price.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3550 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 TI or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10500 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or AMD RX 5700-XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Supported
